332619.<pc>のふところにいる\nおとも精霊の イルッピを通して\n隠者パンメッポの声:
Panmeppo's voice came through Spirit Companion
Iruppi at the foot of <pc>.

332620.「アー アー 聞こえているかの？\n おぬしに託した おとも精霊を通して\n わ:
Ah, ah, can you hear me? I am bringing you my
voice through Spirit Companion, which I
entrusted to you.

332621.「どうやら 目的地に たどり着いたようじゃな。\n 精霊の姿も はっきり とらえ:
It seems that they have reached their
destination. The spirit's image was clearly
captured. You have talent, after all.

332622.「さて。精霊のグラスを通して 世界の様子を\n 見た感想は どうじゃ？:
So, how do you feel about seeing the world
through Spiritglasses?

332623.「なかなか 壮観なものじゃろう。\n 人の手が入らぬ原生林ゆえ 傷ついた地の修復:
It is quite a spectacle, isn't it? The virgin forests are untouched by man, so not much spirit is consumed in the restoration of the
damaged areas.

332624.「精霊たちは その役割を果たす時を\n 人知れず ただただ 待っておるのじゃよ。:
The spirits are simply waiting, unnoticed, for
the time to fulfill their role.

332625.「……では 次の場所に 向かってもらおうかの。\n 真なるレンダーシア大陸に 不:
Well then, let's move on to the next place. Do
you know that on the true continent of
Lendersia lies a barren desert wilderness?

332626.「砂漠の北には 巨大な遺跡が建っておる。\n わしは まったく 興味がないが\n:
There are huge ruins in the northern part of
the desert. I have no interest in them, but
there is talk of hidden treasures.

332627.「他にも いくつか 小さな遺跡があるでな。\n 砂漠の真ん中辺りのひとつに登って:
There are several other small ruins. Climb up
on one of them in the middle of the desert and
take a look around.

332628.「遺跡の場所は あえて 言わずにおこう。\n おのれの足で 見つけてみせるのじゃ:
I dare not tell you where the ruins are. You
will find them with your own feet. So be on
your way, <pc>.

332629.<pc>のふところにいる\nおとも精霊の イルッピを通して\n隠者パンメッポの声:
Panmeppo's voice came through Spirit Companion
Iruppi at the foot of <pc>.

332630.「３つめの目的地に 着いたようじゃな。\n そこもまた 自然が豊かなままで 精霊:
It seems we have arrived at our third destination. There, too, nature has remained rich and the spirits have not been used to
restore the earth.

332631.「このように 世界が 多くの精霊で\n 満ちていることが 重要なのじゃ。:
Thus, it is important that the world be filled
with many spirits.

332632.「じゃが 先ほども 見てきたように\n 精霊たちが 枯渇しつつある場所もある。:
But as we have just seen, there are places
where the spirits are being depleted.

332633.「時の流れや 人の手により 自然が壊される。\n 修復のために 精霊たちが 消え:
Nature is destroyed by the passage of time and
the hand of man. In order to restore it, the
spirits disappear. This cycle continues.

332634.「精霊は 成熟した自然から 生まれてくるが\n 世界全体で見れば それよりも\n:
Spirits come from mature nature, but the world
as a whole is consuming more than it is
generating.

332635.「わしには それを止める手立てはない。\n じゃが 状況を見守り 人々に憂いを\:
I can't do anything to stop it. But I think I
can at least keep an eye on the situation and
express my concern to the people.

332636.「おぬしにも いずれは……\n むむっ？ なんじゃ この気配は！？: You will, too, eventually... What's this sign?

332637.「精霊を 喰っておる……。\n この魔物は 一体 なんなのじゃ！？:
It's eating the spirits... What in the world
is this monster?

332638.「……放っておくわけにはいかぬが\n あの速さでは 今から 追いつくのも\n 難:
I can't leave him there, but at that speed, it
will be hard to catch up to him now.

332639.「ここは いったん わしのもとへ戻れ。\n わしも 精霊たちから 情報を集めてお:
Return to me for the time being. I will gather
information from the spirits.
